basic_information.scholarship_name: The Bobby Gene Roberts Business Scholarship

description: The is a business scholarship in College of Business (General Business department) Criteria shall be: Business Major or Minor. Must be enrolled full-time & completed 24 hours at UCO. 2.5 or above GPA 1st Preference: UCO student currently working at Jackson Chiropractic in Edmond Oklahoma

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
